Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2313 affecting package bpftrace for versions less than 0.20.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2313 affecting package bpftrace for versions less than 0.20.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package bpftrace is earlier than 0.20.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-2313
